text:
#ICYMI
If #chloroquine is so "dangerous" —even "poisonous," why has the CDC for years advised: “Both adults and children should take one dose of chloroquine per week starting at least 1 week before traveling to the area where malaria transmission occurs"
https://t.co/7jnMInNhY7… https://t.co/lWwmBjnvwj
